message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000. This is a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal, and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was hoping to get a better deal. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products. I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.
